description: PK. Unique customer identifier. Format: C0, C1, …
Customer age in years. Range: 21–70.
CDD risk tier: low | medium | high | very_high.
Politically Exposed Person: 1=PEP. Triggers EDD.
Declared occupation: salaried | self_employed | business_owner | student | retired | government_employee | freelancer | unemployed.
Business sector: finance | retail | healthcare | technology | real_estate | manufacturing | education | hospitality | construction | unknown.
Primary account type: retail | corporate | savings | current | business.
KYC depth: low=basic ID | medium=standard | high=full EDD.
Declared income range: low | medium | high.
Home jurisdiction risk: low | medium | high (FATF-aligned).
Days since customer relationship established. Range: 30–3650.
PK. Unique account identifier. Format: A0, A1, …
Average account balance in INR (lognormal). Denominator for amount_to_balance_ratio.
Days since account was opened. <60 days = high-risk for identity fraud.
PK. Unique device fingerprint. Format: D0, D1, …
Age of device in days. Range: 30–1500.
1 = rooted (Android) / jailbroken (iOS). Tampering indicator.
Operating system: android | ios | windows | unknown.
1 = VPN/proxy detected. Geo-masking indicator.
1 = emulated environment, not a physical device. Strong fraud signal.
PK. Unique external payment destination. Format: B0, B1, …
Type: individual | merchant | crypto | offshore. crypto/offshore = high risk.
Beneficiary jurisdiction risk: low | medium | high.
